CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(New_Value__c, '001'), HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_540, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_540))+ New_Value__c,'Account'), IF(CONTAINS(New_Value__c, '003'), HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_540, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_540))+ New_Value__c,'Contact'),New_Value__c ))
CustomField.label: New Value
